total_space_mk_preimage_source:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
@[simp]
theorem total_space_mk_preimage_source (b : B) :
    «expr ⁻¹' » (totalSpaceMk b) (a.pretrivialization_at b).source = univ :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.total_space_mk_preimage_source b
#align total_space_mk_preimage_source total_space_mk_preimage_source
to_vector_bundle:
/-- Make a `vector_bundle` from a `vector_prebundle`.  Concretely this means
that, given a `vector_prebundle` structure for a sigma-type `E` -- which consists of a
number of "pretrivializations" identifying parts of `E` with product spaces `U × F` -- one
establishes that for the topology constructed on the sigma-type using
`vector_prebundle.total_space_topology`, these "pretrivializations" are actually
"trivializations" (i.e., homeomorphisms with respect to the constructed topology). -/
theorem to_vector_bundle :
    @vector_bundle R _ F E _ _ _ _ _ _ a.total_space_topology a.fiber_topology a.to_fiber_bundle :=
  { trivialization_linear' := by
      rintro _ ⟨e, he, rfl⟩
      apply linear_of_mem_pretrivialization_atlas
    continuous_on_coord_change' := by
      rintro _ _ ⟨e, he, rfl⟩ ⟨e', he', rfl⟩
      refine' (a.continuous_on_coord_change he he').congr _
      intro b hb
      ext v
      rw [a.coord_change_apply he he' hb v, continuous_linear_equiv.coe_coe, trivialization.coord_changeL_apply]
      exacts[rfl, hb] }
#align to_vector_bundle to_vector_bundle
symmₗ_linear_map_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem symmₗ_linear_map_at (e : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ∈ e.base_set) (y : E b) :
    e.symmₗ R b (e.linear_map_at R b y) = y :=
  e.to_pretrivialization.symmₗ_linear_map_at hb y
#align symmₗ_linear_map_at symmₗ_linear_map_at
symm_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem symm_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq (e : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set) : ((e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb).symm : F → E b) = e.symmL R b :=
  rfl
#align symm_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq symm_continuous_linear_equiv_at_eq
symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm (e : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B)
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set) (z : F) :
    e.to_local_homeomorph.symm ⟨b, z⟩ = totalSpaceMk b ((e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb).symm z) :=
  by
  have h : (b, z) ∈ e.to_local_homeomorph.target := by
    rw [e.target_eq]
    exact ⟨hb, mem_univ _⟩
  apply e.to_local_homeomorph.inj_on (e.to_local_homeomorph.map_target h)
  · simp only [e.source_eq, hb, mem_preimage]
  simp_rw [e.apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb, e.to_local_homeomorph.right_inv h,
    continuous_linear_equiv.apply_symm_apply]
#align symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm symm_apply_eq_mk_continuous_linear_equiv_at_symm
symmL_continuous_linear_map_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
-- given explicitly to help `simps`
-- given explicitly to help `simps`
theorem symmL_continuous_linear_map_at (e : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ∈ e.base_set)
    (y : E b) : e.symmL R b (e.continuous_linear_map_at R b y) = y :=
  e.symmₗ_linear_map_at hb y
#align symmL_continuous_linear_map_at symmL_continuous_linear_map_at
mk_coord_changeL:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem mk_coord_changeL (e e' : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) (y : F) : (b, coord_changeL R e e' b y) = e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b y)) :=
  by
  ext
  · rw [e.mk_symm hb.1 y, e'.coe_fst', e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    rw [e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    exact hb.2
  · exact e.coord_changeL_apply e' hb y
#align mk_coord_changeL mk_coord_changeL
mk_coord_change:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem mk_coord_change (a : vector_prebundle R F E) {e e' : pretrivialization F ((exprπ) E)}
    (he : e ∈ a.pretrivialization_atlas) (he' : e' ∈ a.pretrivialization_atlas) {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) (v : F) : (b, a.coord_change he he' b v) = e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b v)) :=
  by
  ext
  · rw [e.mk_symm hb.1 v, e'.coe_fst', e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    rw [e.proj_symm_apply' hb.1]
    exact hb.2
  · exact a.coord_change_apply he he' hb v
#align mk_coord_change mk_coord_change
mem_trivialization_at_source:
theorem mem_trivialization_at_source (b : B) (x : E b) : totalSpaceMk b x ∈ (a.pretrivialization_at b).source :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.mem_trivialization_at_source b x
#align mem_trivialization_at_source mem_trivialization_at_source
mem_triv_change_source:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_triv_change_source (i j : ι) (p : B × F) :
    p ∈ (Z.triv_change i j).source ↔ p.1 ∈ Z.base_set i ∩ Z.base_set j :=
  fiber_bundle_core.mem_triv_change_source (↑Z) i j p
#align mem_triv_change_source mem_triv_change_source
mem_source_at:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_source_at : (⟨b, a⟩ : Z.total_space) ∈ (Z.local_triv_at b).source :=
  by
  rw [local_triv_at, mem_local_triv_source]
  exact Z.mem_base_set_at b
#align mem_source_at mem_source_at
mem_local_triv_target:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_local_triv_target (p : B × F) : p ∈ (Z.local_triv i).target ↔ p.1 ∈ (Z.local_triv i).base_set :=
  Z.to_fiber_bundle_core.mem_local_triv_target i p
#align mem_local_triv_target mem_local_triv_target
mem_local_triv_source:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_local_triv_source (p : Z.total_space) : p ∈ (Z.local_triv i).source ↔ p.1 ∈ Z.base_set i := by
  dsimp [vector_bundle_core.fiber] <;> exact iff.rfl
#align mem_local_triv_source mem_local_triv_source
mem_local_triv_at_base_set:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_local_triv_at_base_set : b ∈ (Z.local_triv_at b).base_set :=
  fiber_bundle_core.mem_local_triv_at_base_set Z b
#align mem_local_triv_at_base_set mem_local_triv_at_base_set
local_triv_symm_fst:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_symm_fst (p : B × F) :
    (Z.local_triv i).to_local_homeomorph.symm p = ⟨p.1, Z.coord_change i (Z.index_at p.1) p.1 p.2⟩ :=
  rfl
#align local_triv_symm_fst local_triv_symm_fst
local_triv_symm_apply:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_symm_apply {b : B} (hb : b ∈ Z.base_set i) (v : F) :
    (Z.local_triv i).symm b v = Z.coord_change i (Z.index_at b) b v := by apply (Z.local_triv i).symm_apply hb v
#align local_triv_symm_apply local_triv_symm_apply
local_triv_coord_change_eq:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_coord_change_eq {b : B} (hb : b ∈ Z.base_set i ∩ Z.base_set j) (v : F) :
    (Z.local_triv i).coord_changeL R (Z.local_triv j) b v = Z.coord_change i j b v :=
  by
  rw [trivialization.coord_changeL_apply', local_triv_symm_fst, local_triv_apply, coord_change_comp]
  exacts[⟨⟨hb.1, Z.mem_base_set_at b⟩, hb.2⟩, hb]
#align local_triv_coord_change_eq local_triv_coord_change_eq
local_triv_at_def:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_at_def : Z.local_triv (Z.index_at b) = Z.local_triv_at b :=
  rfl
#align local_triv_at_def local_triv_at_def
local_triv_at_apply_mk:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_at_apply_mk (b : B) (a : F) : (Z.local_triv_at b) ⟨b, a⟩ = ⟨b, a⟩ :=
  Z.local_triv_at_apply _
#align local_triv_at_apply_mk local_triv_at_apply_mk
local_triv_at_apply:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_at_apply (p : Z.total_space) : (Z.local_triv_at p.1) p = ⟨p.1, p.2⟩ :=
  fiber_bundle_core.local_triv_at_apply Z p
#align local_triv_at_apply local_triv_at_apply
local_triv_apply:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem local_triv_apply (p : Z.total_space) : (Z.local_triv i) p = ⟨p.1, Z.coord_change (Z.index_at p.1) i p.1 p.2⟩ :=
  rfl
#align local_triv_apply local_triv_apply

linear:
protected theorem linear [add_comm_monoid F] [Module R F] [∀ x, add_comm_monoid (E x)] [∀ x, Module R (E x)]
    [e.is_linear R] {b : B} (hb : b ∈ e.base_set) : is_linear_map R fun y : E b => (e (totalSpaceMk b y)).2 :=
  trivialization.is_linear.linear b hb
#align linear linear
is_open_map_proj:
/-- The projection on the base of a vector bundle created from core is an open map -/
theorem is_open_map_proj : is_open_map Z.proj :=
  fiber_bundle_core.is_open_map_proj Z
#align is_open_map_proj is_open_map_proj
inducing_total_space_mk:
@[continuity]
theorem inducing_total_space_mk (b : B) : @inducing _ _ (a.fiber_topology b) a.total_space_topology (totalSpaceMk b) :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.inducing_total_space_mk b

coord_change_linear_comp:
theorem coord_change_linear_comp (i j k : ι) :
    ∀ x ∈ Z.base_set i ∩ Z.base_set j ∩ Z.base_set k,
      (Z.coord_change j k x).comp (Z.coord_change i j x) = Z.coord_change i k x :=
  fun x hx => by
  ext v
  exact Z.coord_change_comp i j k x hx v
#align coord_change_linear_comp coord_change_linear_comp
coord_changeL_symm_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
theorem coord_changeL_symm_apply (e e' : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) :
    «expr⇑ » (coord_changeL R e e' b).symm = (e'.linear_equiv_at R b hb.2).symm.trans (e.linear_equiv_at R b hb.1) :=
  congr_arg linear_equiv.inv_fun (dif_pos hb)
#align coord_changeL_symm_apply coord_changeL_symm_apply
coord_changeL_apply':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
/-- A version of `coord_change_apply` that fully unfolds `coord_change`. The right-hand side is
ugly, but has good definitional properties for specifically defined trivializations. -/
theorem coord_changeL_apply' (e e' : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) (y : F) :
    coord_changeL R e e' b y = (e' (e.to_local_homeomorph.symm (b, y))).2 := by
  rw [e.coord_changeL_apply e' hb, e.mk_symm hb.1]
#align coord_changeL_apply' coord_changeL_apply'
coord_changeL_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem coord_changeL_apply (e e' : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] [e'.is_linear R] {b : B}
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) (y : F) : coord_changeL R e e' b y = (e' (totalSpaceMk b (e.symm b y))).2 :=
  congr_arg (fun f => linear_equiv.to_fun f y) (dif_pos hb)
#align coord_changeL_apply coord_changeL_apply
continuous_total_space_mk:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_total_space_mk (b : B) :
    @continuous _ _ (a.fiber_topology b) a.total_space_topology (totalSpaceMk b) :=
  a.to_fiber_prebundle.continuous_total_space_mk b
#align continuous_total_space_mk continuous_total_space_mk
continuous_proj:

theorem continuous_proj : continuous Z.proj :=
  fiber_bundle_core.continuous_proj Z
#align continuous_proj continuous_proj
continuous_on_coord_change:

theorem continuous_on_coord_change (a : vector_prebundle R F E) {e e' : pretrivialization F ((exprπ) E)}
    (he : e ∈ a.pretrivialization_atlas) (he' : e' ∈ a.pretrivialization_atlas) :
    continuous_on (a.coord_change he he') (e.base_set ∩ e'.base_set) :=
  (Classical.choose_spec (a.exists_coord_change e he e' he')).1
#align continuous_on_coord_change continuous_on_coord_change

apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprπ -/
theorem apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at (e : trivialization F ((exprπ) E)) [e.is_linear R] (b : B)
    (hb : b ∈ e.base_set) (z : E b) : e.to_local_homeomorph ⟨b, z⟩ = (b, e.continuous_linear_equiv_at R b hb z) :=
  by
  ext
  · refine' e.coe_fst _
    rw [e.source_eq]
    exact hb
  · simp only [coe_coe, continuous_linear_equiv_at_apply]
#align apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at apply_eq_prod_continuous_linear_equiv_at
